page.title: 11INDUSTRY CONTINUED
page.content: {INDUSTRY continued materials from the USA being transhipped from large continental ports.Grove Wharf has 200,000 square feet of warehousing and 15 acres of open storage.Wharton Shipping also has a fleet of 5 vessels and its own haulage fleet to move the cargo to all parts of the UK. There is also a small industrial estate on Hebden Road, the main company here being Grant Lyon Eagre who build and maintain railway track all over the UK.Smaller firms produce clothing and supply local firms with items such as tyres, van hire and industrial foam.The offices of the local Health Authority can be found on Hebden Road.
